comment.author: 18793187@N07
comment._content: My work career was based on the principles of the Gilbreaths and the many efficiency experts of the early 1900-1970 era. My time covered 1951-1996. Time Study, Motion Study, Methods Time Measurement provided a solid base from which to practice Industrial Engineering. Automation took the Art out of Production Engineering and required considerable more capital to move the production level from one automated method to the next improved level. I'm now 82 and perhaps one of the last of my breed.
